series_title: Administrative and Executive: Compacts of the
series_description: This series documents compacts, and their background, between the Commonwealth and other states or governing bodies/agencies. This series may include, but is not limited to: copy of the legislation and correspondence
This series consists of executive orders and memoranda, proclamations, and writs of election."

series_title: Administrative and Executive: Judicial Appointments and
series_description: This series documents the judicial appointment process. This series may include, but is not limited to: judicial appointment orders, oaths, and resignations.

series_title: Administrative and Executive: Name and Insignia Registration of Organizations
series_description: This series documents the process of registering names, mottos, logos, and insignia of certain societies, organizations, and associations. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, Secretary-signed registration forms, and supporting documentation
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Administrative and Executive: Resolutions of Reapportionment
series_description: This series documents the notifications received from political subdivisions related to reapportionments due to redistribution representation, similar notifications of other boundary and any dissemination of that information to state government departments. This series may include, but is not limited to: certified copies of the local governing body's ordinance or resolution, boundary descriptions, and maps

This series documents the authentication and receipt of official documents that verify to foreign governments that certain Virginia officials are in good standing. This series may include, but is not limited to: a copy of the cover letter requesting authentication and supporting documentation, weekly and monthly authentication status reports, and air bills for delivery authenticated documents to the requestor

This series documents all aspects of the pardon process, including pardon approvals granted by the Governor, denials issued, and incomplete files. This series may include, but is limited to: a copy of the pardon or denial letter, parole board investigation documentation, recommendation letter, and other correspondence. NOTE: This series contains confidential and privacy protected information

This series documents the receipt of conflict of interest statements for elected and appointed officials by the Secretary of the Commonwealth. This series includes, but is not limited original financial disclosure statements and statements of economic interests
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the extradition process. This series include, but is not limited to: requisitions (Virginia’s request of another state to return a fugitive to Virginia’s jurisdiction), renditions (another state’s request of Virginia to return a to the requesting state’s jurisdiction), and supporting documentation. NOTE: This series may contain confidential privacy-protected information

This series documents official orders to transport fugitives from state to state. The original order is kept by the applicable law enforcement agency. This series may include, but is not to: orders and supporting documentation.

This series documents the consent of alleged criminals to to the demanding state or jurisdiction holding warrant for and that a copy of the consent was sent to appropriate law enforcement agent(s). This series may contain, but is not limited to: waiver and supporting documentation.

This series documents the appointments made by the to boards and commissions including the information on the authority for each appointment, term length and term dates for each appointee, eligibility requirements, as well as individual appointee’s name, address and telephone number. This series consists of a database

This series documents the Governor’s appointment of an individual to a board or commission, including the name of board or commission, name and address of appointee, appointment date, length of appointment, date appointment expires, oath of office, and name of previous appointee. This series may include, but is not limited to: lists and a database.

This series documents the process of appointing, and to appoint, applicants to boards and commissions. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, letters, appointment worksheets, resumes, confidential memoranda, and other supporting documentation.
This series documents the registration of individuals as lobbyists to the General Assembly. This series may include, is not limited to: original registration forms and disclosure statements

This series documents the registration of individuals as lobbyists to the General Assembly and includes summary information from series 015121, "Lobbyist Files,” such as contact information, and a brief statement listing the reason for lobbying for a particular organization. This series includes a searchable database that is made available to the public through the Secretary's website.

This series documents the registration of individuals as lobbyists to the General Assembly and includes summary information from series 015121, "Lobbyist," such as name, contact information, and a brief statement listing the reason for lobbying for a particular organization. This series includes a searchable database that is made available to the public through the Secretary's website.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the registration of notaries public and dates of their appointments. This series may include, but is not limited to: original, approved applications
retention_statement: 75 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the hearing of complaints against publics that resulted in disqualification. This series may but is not limited to: correspondence, transcripts, and decision letters

series_title: Notary Public Hearings: Exonerated or No Action Taken
series_description: This series documents the hearing of complaints against publics in which they were either exonerated or no action was taken. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, transcripts, and decision letters.

This series documents the registration of persons appointed to be notaries public, including summary information from series 015122 and commission information, including name, commission number, expiration date and status. This series consists of a database that is made available to the public through the Secretary’s website.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents all aspects of the restoration of rights process. This series may include, but is not limited to: a copy restoration of rights certificate or denial letter, original application, recommendation letters, parole information, and police record checks. NOTE: This series contains confidential and privacy-protected information.

This series documents the service of legal notices to out-ofstate defendants, including information on the originating court and the party or parties being served. This series may include, but is not limited to: affidavits, notices, lists, and certified-mail receipts
